description: TDK is working on its next generation of batteries that will be equipped to power smartphones through AI tasks. Apple and Samsung are TDK’s biggest customers, each contributing about 10 percent of the Japanese company’s overall revenue.
title: iPhone Supplier TDK Readies Batteries Geared for Thin AI Gadgets

description: Urban Genesis smartwatch has been launched in India with a 1.45-inch circular AMOLED display. It was introduced in the country on Thursday and comes with a full-metal body, a stainless steel block strap as well as two functional buttons. The smart wearable is said to track the users' heart, blood pressure, blood oxygen level and sleep patterns.
title: Urban Genesis Smartwatch With 1.45-inch AMOLED Display, Up to 7 Days of Battery Life Launched in India

description: Amazfit Bip 6 was launched in India on Friday. The smartwatch comes with a 1.97-inch rectangular AMOLED display and a 5 ATM rating for water resistance. It is claimed to offer a battery life of up to 14 days on a single charge with typical usage. In battery saver mode, the smart wearable can last for up to 26 days. It supports Bluetooth calling and offline OSM map-backed navigation.
title: Amazfit Bip 6 With 1.97-Inch AMOLED Display, Up to 14 Days of Battery Life Launched in India: Price, Features

description: Coinbase has estimated that it could see expenses between $180 million (roughly Rs. 1,541 crore) - $400 million (roughly Rs. 3,426 crore) as it sets to manage the situation after a recent data breach incident. As part of the attack, cybercriminals managed to lure in funds from the exposed users under false claims and Coinbase plans to voluntarily reimburse the attacked users.
title: Coinbase Faces Up to $400 Million Reimbursement Cost After Recent Cyberattack

description: Realme GT 7 and Realme GT 7T will launch soon in global markets, and the Chinese smartphone brand has confirmed that it will also launch a Realme GT 7 Dream Edition alongside the standard Realme GT 7 model. This special edition is likely to come with a distinct design. It could retain the internal specifications of the standard model.
title: Realme GT 7 Dream Edition India Launch Confirmed; Will Arrive Alongside Realme GT 7

description: Samsung is reportedly working on a new artificial intelligence (AI) feature that can turn images into videos. As per a tipster, the South Korean tech giant is developing an AI-powered image-to-video feature that can convert any photo in the user’s gallery into a “few-second-long” video. There are no other details about the feature available.
title: Samsung Working On AI-Powered Image-to-Video Feature, Tipster Claims

description: Stellar Blade is coming to PC a little over a year after its PS5 launch, developer Shift Up has announced. The PC version of the action title will launch on June 11 via Steam and Epic Games Store. The PC version of the game will include new content, high-resolution textures and more.
title: Stellar Blade PC Launch Set for June 11, PC System Requirements Revealed

description: WazirX has been directed by the Singapore High Court to complete some more documentation work before giving it the go-ahead to implement its restructuring scheme. For now, the Singapore court has extended its moratorium cover to WazirX and Zettai to 6 June.
title: WazirX Reimbursement Plan Faces Delay as Singapore Court Extends Existing Moratorium to June 6

description: Garmin Forerunner 970 smartwatch was launched in the US on Thursday alongside the Forerunner 570 variant. They boast circular OLED touch-supported displays and are available in a 47mm size. The Garmin Forerunner 570 model comes in an additional, more compact 42mm option. Both newly-launched watches are equipped with pulse oximeters and skin temperature sensors.
title: Garmin Forerunner 970 With Up to 15 Days of Battery Life Launched Alongside Garmin Forerunner 570

description: Google One subscription service recently crossed 150 million subscribers In 2024, Google introduced a $19.99 a month plan with access to AI capabilities unavailable for free users. The company continues to offer Google One subscription tiers for file storage, but without most AI features, at lower prices.
title: Google One Hits 150 Million Subscribers With Help of AI

description: The delay in the release of the Grand Theft Auto 6 is not souring sentiment on the stock for the investors in Take-Two Interactive Software. The pre-announced delay could de-risk results due after the close, especially as Take-Two said it continues to expect sequential increases and record levels in net bookings.
title: Grand Theft Auto 6 Delay Fails to Dent Take-Two Investor Zeal

description: Meta Platforms asked a federal judge on Thursday to throw out the US Federal Trade Commission's case that accuses it of illegal social media monopoly. Meta is now presenting its own evidence at the trial, which may run into June.
title: Meta Asks Judge to Rule that FTC Failed to Prove its Monopoly Case

description: Meta is reportedly delaying the release of its flagship "Behemoth" AI. Early in its development, Behemoth was internally scheduled for release in April to coincide with Meta's inaugural AI conference for developers.
title: Meta Delays Release of Its 'Behemoth' AI Model: Report

description: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra is currently available at a lower price on several e-commerce platforms in India. The handset is powered by the Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 Mobile Platform for Galaxy and offers popular Galaxy AI features. Customers can purchase the Galaxy S24 Ultra with an initial discount to get it at a reduced rate than its launch price on Amazon and Flipkart. The lower price is expected to be available for a limited period.
title: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra Available at Lower Price on Amazon and Flipkart With Discounts, Bank Offers

description: Windsurf, an artificial intelligence (AI) no-code or vibe coding platform, released a series of AI models on Thursday. Dubbed SWE-1, these models are focused on complex software engineering tasks, and not just writing code. The series comprises SWE-1, SWE-1-lite, and SWE-1-mini, where each model is designed for specific use cases.
title: Windsurf Releases SWE-1 Series AI Models Capable of Full-Process Software Development

description: Moto G56 is expected to go official soon as a successor to last year's Moto G55. While we wait for the formal announcement, a fresh leak has revealed what the Moto G56 will look like. The leaked renders show a design reminiscent of its predecessor. The 5G phone is said to be available in four colour options, with three of them already revealed in the new leak. The Moto G56 is tipped to come with a 6.72-inch display and a 5,200mAh battery.
title: Moto G56 Design With Dual Rear Cameras, Colour Options Spotted in Leaked Renders

description: Alcatel, the French mobile brand operated by TCL Communication, has officially announced the India launch date for its upcoming V3 series. While Alcatel has only confirmed the existence of the Alcatel V3 Ultra model, reports suggest that the V3 series will include the Alcatel V3 Pro and V3 Classic as well. The Alcatel V3 Ultra 5G is teased to come with a triple rear camera module and will support a stylus.
title: Alcatel V3 Series Officially Confirmed to Launch in India on May 27

description: Microsoft PCs with an Arm-based AMD processor could be launched in 2026, as successors to the Surface Laptop 7 and Surface Pro 11. According to a tipster, these future devices may offer more affordable options compared to current models featuring Qualcomm's Snapdragon X series.
title: Microsoft Surface Pro, Surface Laptop With Arm-Based Processors Tipped to Launch in 2026

description: Netflix unveiled a new artificial intelligence (AI) for its advertisers at its Upfront event on Wednesday. The streaming platform is heavily investing in its new in-house ad platform dubbed Netflix Ads Suite, and it showcased some of the features and tools that advertisers can leverage. The company also unveiled several ad formats to help its clients reach their desired targets.
title: Netflix Unveils AI-Powered Feature That Will Blend Ads With Shows and Movies

description: Nothing on Friday commenced the rollout of a new OS update for its flagship smartphone, the Nothing Phone 2. It is said to bring new features along with performance and stability improvements. One of the standout additions is a Privacy Space feature which acts like a digital safe and allows users to secure sensitive apps and data. Nothing has also introduced the new Nothing Gallery app which arrives as an alternative to Google Photos on the Nothing Phone 2a.
title: Nothing Phone 2 Update Brings Privacy Space, Stability Improvements and Latest Security Patch

description: iPhone 16 was launched in India in September 2024 alongside the Plus, Pro and Pro Max variants. The base version is powered by a 3nm octa-core A18 chipset and is offered in 128GB, 256GB and 512GB storage options. At launch, the price of the vanilla iPhone 16 started at Rs. 79,900. You can now get the 128GB variant for as low as Rs. 69,500.
title: iPhone 16 Now Available in India For As Low As Rs. 69,500; Offer Valid for Limited Period

description: Oppo's A5, A5 5G, and A5x have been part of the rumour mill for quite some time. Now, the Chinese smartphone brand has listed the A series smartphones on its website, revealing their design, specifications, colour options, and RAM and storage details. The Oppo A5, A5 5G, and A5x feature 6.67-inch displays with up to 120Hz refresh rate.
title: Oppo A5 5G, Oppo A5, Oppo A5x Listed Online; Colour Options, Specifications Revealed

description: Sony has revealed the slate of games joining the PlayStation Plus Game Catalog in May. This month’s lineup is led by Sand Land, the action-RPG based on the popular Manga series of the same name. Other games joining the PS Plus Game Catalog this month include role-playing title Soul Hackers 2, survival horror title Five Nights at Freddy’s: Help Wanted – Full Time Edition and more.
title: PS Plus Game Catalog Adds Sand Land, Soul Hackers 2, Stalker Trilogy and More in May

description: Samsung is said to be in the process of bringing a camera feature, which it debuted with the new Galaxy S25 Edge, to the entire flagship Galaxy S25 lineup. According to a tipster, it may enable support for capturing LOG (logarithmic footage) videos via the front-facing selfie camera across the entire series.
title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Series May Gain Galaxy S25 Edge’s LOG Video Recording for Front Camera

description: Xiaomi Civi 5 Pro is confirmed to launch soon. Xiaomi has announced the China launch timeline of its new Civi series phone on Friday. The brand has also shared teasers revealing the design, colour options, and specifications of the upcoming Civi phone. It will be available in at least four shades with a Leica-tuned rear camera unit.
title: Xiaomi Civi 5 Pro Launch Timeline Confirmed; Teased to Get 50-Megapixel Front Camera

description: YouTube unveiled a new artificial intelligence (AI) feature for its advertisers on Wednesday. The new feature, dubbed Peak Points, was showcased at the company’s Brandcast event held in New York. The Google-owned video streaming giant said that the feature will use Gemini to determine the moment in a video where viewers are most engaged.
title: YouTube Announces Gemini-Powered ‘Peak Points’ to Pinpoint Optimal Ad Moments in a Video

description: Google announced rolling out new artificial intelligence (AI) and accessibility features to Android and the Chrome browser on Thursday. The Mountain View-based tech giant introduced these features on the occasion of the Global Accessibility Awareness Day, observed on the third Thursday in May. The company has added Gemini capabilities to the alt text description feature, and is now expanding the Expressive Captions feature, which was only available in the US.
title: Google Adding New AI and Accessibility Features for Android and Chrome Browser

description: Huawei hosted a launch event in Berlin on Thursday. The company unveiled a host of products on the day, including the Huawei MatePad Pro 12.2 (2025) and the Freebuds 6 earphones. The tablet comes with a Tandem OLED PaperMatte display and dual-cell 5,050mAh battery with 100W wired fast charging support. The Huawei Freebuds 6, on the other hand, have 11mm dynamic drivers alongside micro-flat tweeters and a claimed 36 hours of total playback time.
title: Huawei MatePad Pro 12.2 (2025) With PaperMatte Display Launched Globally Alongside Huawei FreeBuds 6

description: There has been a lot of back and forth regarding which processor will power Samsung’s upcoming Galaxy S25 FE smartphone. While initial reports hinted that the phone would use an Exynos 2400e SoC, later reports pointed to a more powerful MediaTek Dimensity 9400 SoC instead. Now a benchmark listing with the product model name hints at another processor, adding to the confusion.
title: Samsung Galaxy S25 FE Arrives on Geekbench; US Model Could Feature Exynos 2400 Chipset

description: Bharti Airtel on Thursday introduced a new fraud detection solution which aims to safeguard consumers against rising risk of online fraud. It is said to work across OTT apps and communication platforms such as WhatsApp, Instagram, and Facebook, shielding them any potential threats. When a customer tries to access a website that has been flagged as malicious by Airtel’s security system, the page loading process is blocked and they are redirected to a page which details the potential threat.
title: Airtel Introduces AI-Powered Fraud Detection Solution for Emails, WhatsApp and More

description: The overall crypto market cap rose by under one percent in the last 24 hours. While Bitcoin registered small gains, Ether logged minor losses on Friday, May 16. While Solana, Dogecoin, and Cardano clocked minor losses, Litecoin and Iota managed to see profits.
title: Bitcoin Price Rises Above $104,000 Mark; JPMorgan Says Bitcoin Could Outperform Gold in H2 2025

description: A Complete Unknown, directed by James Mangold, is an American biopic of the famous Bob Dylan. Viewers will get to embark on his journey of achieving success and making his name popular worldwide. The plot follows his journey that started from 1961 as a 19-year-old guy, and how his electric guitar made him an overnight sensation at the Newport Folk Festival.
title: A Complete Unknown OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Bob Dylan's Movie Online?

description: Raising excitement across Telugu social media circles, Devika & Danny have already stirred interest with its romantic vibes and emotionally rich storytelling. The first-look poster featuring lead actors Ritu Varma and Surya Vasistta has heightened anticipation among audiences. With an OTT release planned on JioHotstar, the series is expected to appeal to viewers who enjoy heartfelt, relatable love stories rooted in Indian middle-class culture.
title: Devika & Danny OTT Release: A Fresh Telugu Love Story Set to Stream Soon on JioHotstar

description: Huawei Watch 5 was launched in the UK and select European markets on Thursday alongside the Watch Fit 4 and Watch Fit 4 Pro. The Huawei Watch 5 is available in 42mm and 46mm variants. The smartwatch supports Bluetooth calling and eSIM connectivity. It is accompanied by the Huawei Watch Fit 4 lineup, which is equipped with a 1.82-inch AMOLED display and inbuilt GPS support.
title: Huawei Watch 5 With eSIM Connectivity Launched Globally Alongside Watch Fit 4 Series: Price, Features

description: Nesippaya is a Tamil romantic thriller that intertwines love, mystery, and justice. Following its theatrical success in early 2025, the film is now available on Lionsgate Play, offering viewers a chance to witness a compelling story with powerful emotional depth.
title: Nesippaya Now Streaming on Lionsgate Play: What You Need to Know About Akash Murli and Aditi Shankar Starrer Movie

description: Realme GT 7 and Realme GT 7T will be announced in global markets, including India, on May 27. While Realme is actively revealing details about the GT series through social media channels, alleged pricing and specifications of the phones have surfaced on the Web. Both models are tipped to feature AMOLED displays with 120Hz refresh rate.
title: Realme GT 7, Realme GT 7T Price and Specifications Leaked Ahead of May 27 Launch

description: Created by Alfred Gough and Miles Millar, Wednesday is an American Dark Mystery series that is set to return with the most anticipated season 2. The second season will be divided into two parts, wherein part 1 will be released on August 06, 2025, only on Netflix. The plot will follow the return of Wednesday Addams to Nevermore Academy for her second year, where her journey is about to get a whole lot darker
title: Wednesday Season 2 Part 1 OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Xiaomi XRING 01, the tech giant's first in-house smartphone chipset, is slated for launch this month, Xiaomi CEO Lei Jun announced on Weibo. Debuting on a new Xiaomi handset, the high-performance processor aims to lessen Xiaomi's dependence on Qualcomm and MediaTek for smartphone chipsets.
title: Xiaomi XRING 01 Chipset Teased by CEO Lei Jun Ahead of Launch

description: Apple on Thursday unveiled the next generation of CarPlay — its in-car user-friendly solution for accessing content on your smartphone while you drive. It builds upon the existing capabilities to provide a deeper integration with the vehicle. Apple says the new CarPlay Ultra provides information for all driver’s screens, including real-time content and gauges in the instrument cluster and widgets powered by iPhone. The company is working with global automakers such as Hyundai, Kia, and Genesis to bring this experience to cars soon.
title: Apple Debuts Next-Generation CarPlay Ultra Beginning With Aston Martin

description: Sony WH-1000XM6 wireless active noise cancelling (ANC) headphones were launched in India on Thursday. They replace the existing WH-1000XM5 as the Japanese electronics brand's flagship-level headphones and are powered by a new HD Noise Canceling Processor QN3. It uses 12 microphones for delivering more precise noise cancellation. The headphones come with LDAC codec support for high-resolution audio streaming along with 360 Spatial Sound technology.
title: Sony WH-1000XM6 Wireless Active Noise Cancelling Headphones Launched: Price, Specifications
